mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG ( TITLE, WRITER, CONTENTS, HITS, FRST_REG_USER_ID, LAST_CHG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, #{hits}, #{frstRegUserId}, #{lastChgUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENTS, HITS, FRST_REG_DATE, FRST_REG_USER_ID, LAST_CHG_DATE, LAST_CHG_USER_ID FROM BLOG WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT ID, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENTS, HITS, FRST_REG_DATE, FRST_REG_USER_ID, LAST_CHG_DATE, LAST_CHG_USER_ID FROM BLOG WHERE ID = #{id}
